DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the different performance of arterial and venous graft with intra-aortic balloon pump support following coronary artery bypass.
DOC.brief_title: Arterial Versus Venous Graft Recruitment by Intra-Aortic Balloon Pump
DOC.criteria: All patients undergoing coronary artery bypass surgery Aortic insufficiency; Diffuse atherosclerosis impeding intraaortic balloon pump introduction
